column4: i get no sound in UT2004 and its only a ubuntu problem whats the probelm?
i have sound in UT2004 on ubuntu
ok did you do anything special
no, do you have oss working?
it has native linux alsa support...
sure? i thought it used oss. anyway, make sure there are no sound daemons running and look at the logs
lol not quite that advanced, how do i check?
running gnome or kde?
gnome!
people, which is the process of the gnome sound daemon? (i don't use gnome)
then do "ps aux | grep esd"
im going to pastenin it
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/28522/
do "sudo killall -9 esd", then check it is really killed. on "ps aux | grep esd" it should only appear the line ending in grep esd
ok theyre killed ill try it now
nope still nothing
launch ut2004 from console, to see if it says anything
yessir
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/28525/
why are you doing "sudo perl ut2004"
cause im a perl programmer and it works
just do "./ut2004"
("chmod +x ut2004" if it doesn't have exec permission)
well it wouldnt run if i dodnt rhave permissions
